data.title: Very interesting selection,  very odd location
data.text: First impression was. .. we are at the the wrong place.... seriously. The shop is located on the 2nd floor of an apparently now defunct building that had a dance studio on the bottom floor. So the only way to get to the shop is up a narrow stairwell that has signing everywhere for a modeling agency upstairs as well. As far as the options... interesting from balsamic cherry to some other un common options that may be a cultural thing.  The person behind the counter was friendly and offered several samples to try. Some I liked  ( spicy caramel ), some I didn't ( a lemon based caramel ). The shop was clean and prices were fine for the quality you would expect from a gourmet shop. Would be perfect with better location for sure.

user_location.name: West Palm Beach, Florida, United States

data.title: 美味しい❗️
data.text:
今まで食べた中で一番美味しいチョコレートのお店。ゴディバとかより全然美味しい❗️
アンカレッジに二軒あり、キャプテンクックホテルの中のお店はおしゃれなチョコレートブティックになってます。中国人夫婦がオーナーで、旦那さんがキャプテンクックホテルのお店で売っていて、奥さんがダイモンドのお店でチョコレートを作って売っているそうです。この奥さん、絶対ヨーロッパでチョコレート作りを勉強して来たなって感じです。また、その一粒一粒が芸術的に美しいのです！ここのチョコレートがあれば、もう他のチョコレートはいらない！ってくらい好き‼︎
ただし、お高いのが難点です…一粒3ドル75セント------! たま〜の贅沢にどうぞ💕
